topic.title: Clinical Office Visit Summary - conformance rules

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.1.1"
SHALL conform to General Header Constraints template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.1.1)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] component
Contains exactly one [1..1] Consol Problem Section (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.5.1)

Contains exactly one [1..1] component
Contains exactly one [1..1] Consol Medications Section (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.1.1)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] component
Contains exactly one [1..1] Consol Allergies Section (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.6.1)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] component
Contains exactly one [1..1] Results Section (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.3.1)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] component
Contains exactly one [1..1] Procedures Section (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.7.1)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] component
Contains exactly one [1..1] Consol Immunizations Section (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.2.1)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] component
Contains exactly one [1..1] Consol Instructions Section (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.45)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] component
Contains exactly one [1..1] Social History Section (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.17)

Contains exactly one [1..1] component
Contains exactly one [1..1] Medications Administered Section (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.38)

SHALL have one Reason for Visit Section (TemplateID = 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.12) or Chief Complaint Section (TemplateID = 1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.1.13.2.1) or Chief Complaint and Reason for Visit Section (2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.13) or Encounters section entries optional (TemplateID: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.22) or Encounters section entries required (TemplateID: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.22.1)

SHALL satisfy: Shall have one documentationOf/serviceEvent/effectiveTime or componentOf/encompassingEncounter/effectiveTime or Encounters section entries optional (TemplateID: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.22) or Encounters section entries required (TemplateID: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.22.1)

SHALL satisfy: Shall have componentOf/encompassingEncounter/location or Encounters section entries optional (TemplateID: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.22) or Encounters section entries required (TemplateID: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.22.1)

SHALL have at least one documentationOf/serviceEvent/performer/assignedEntity including a documentationOf/serviceEvent/performer/assignedEntity/assignedPerson/name and documentationOf/serviceEvent/performer/assignedEntity/telecom and documentationOf/serviceEvent/performer/assignedEntity/addr
OR at least one componentOf/encompassingEncounter/responsibleParty including a componentOf/encompassingEncounter/responsibleParty/assignedEntity/assignedPerson/name and componentOf/encompassingEncounter/responsibleParty/assignedEntity/telecom and componentOf/encompassingEncounter/responsibleParty/assignedEntity/addr
OR at least one componentOf/encompassingEncounter/encounterParticipant including a componentOf/encompassingEncounter/encounterParticipant/assignedEntity/assignedPerson/name and componentOf/encompassingEncounter/encounterParticipant/assignedEntity/telecom and componentOf/encompassingEncounter/encounterParticipant/assignedEntity/addr
SHALL have one Vital Signs Section with entries optional (TemplateID = 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.4) or one Vital Signs Section with entries required (TemplateID = 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.4.1)
SHALL contain one Medications Administered Section (Template ID = 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.38) or Medications Section with entries required (Template ID = 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.1.1)
SHALL conform to Consol General Header Constraints template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.1.1)
SHALL conform to General Header Constraints template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.1.1)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] realmCode/@code="US" (CONF:16791)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] typeId (CONF:5361)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] id (CONF:5363)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:5253)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] title (CONF:5254)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] effectiveTime (CONF:5256)
Signifies the document creation time, when the document first came into being. Where the CDA document is a transform from an original document in some other format, the ClinicalDocument.effectiveTime is the time the original document is created. The time when the transform occurred is not currently represented in CDA (CONF:9995)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] confidentialityCode, which SHOULD be selected from ValueSet HL7 BasicConfidentialityKind 2.16.840.1.113883.1.11.16926 STATIC (CONF:5259)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] languageCode, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet Language 2.16.840.1.113883.1.11.11526 DYNAMIC (CONF:5372)
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] setId (CONF:5261)
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] versionNumber (CONF:5264)

Contains exactly one [1..1] component, where its type is Component2
Contains exactly one [1..1] Component2

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] componentOf (CONF:9955)
This componentOf SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] encompassingEncounter (CONF:9956)
This encompassingEncounter SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] effectiveTime (CONF:9958)
This encompassingEncounter SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id (CONF:9959)

SHALL contain at least one [1..*] author (CONF:5444)
Such authors SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] time (CONF:5445)
The content SHALL be a conformant US Realm Date and Time (DTM.US.FIELDED) (2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.5.4) (CONF:16866).
Such authors SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] assignedAuthor (CONF:5448)
This assignedAuthor SHALL contain at least one [1..*] addr with @xsi:type="US Realm Address" (CONF:5452)
This assignedAuthor SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] code (CONF:16787), which SHOULD be selected from ValueSet Healthcare Provider Taxonomy (NUCC - HIPAA) 2.16.840.1.114222.4.11.1066 DYNAMIC (CONF:16788)
This assignedAuthor SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id (CONF:5449)
This assignedAuthor SHALL contain at least one [1..*] telecom with @xsi:type="TEL" (CONF:5428)
This assignedAuthor Contains zero or one [0..1] assignedAuthoringDevice
This assignedAuthoringDevice SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] manufacturerModelName (CONF:16784)
This assignedAuthoringDevice SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] softwareName (CONF:16785)
This assignedAuthor Contains zero or one [0..1] assignedPerson
This assignedPerson SHALL contain at least one [1..*] name (CONF:16789)
This assignedAuthor SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] assignedPerson or assignedAuthoringDevice (CONF:16790)
This assignedAuthor If this assignedAuthor is an assignedPerson, the assignedAuthor SHOULD contain zero to one [0..1] id such that it SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.4.6" National Provider Identifier (CONF:31135, CONF:31694)
Such authors This time SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] US Realm Date and Time (DTM.US.FIELDED) (2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.5.4) (CONF:5446)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] dataEnterer (CONF:5441)
This dataEnterer SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] assignedEntity (CONF:5442)
This assignedEntity SHALL contain at least one [1..*] addr with @xsi:type="US Realm Address" (CONF:5460)
This assignedEntity MAY contain zero or one [0..1] code, which SHOULD be selected from (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.101 NUCC Health Care Provider Taxonomy) (CONF:9944)
This assignedEntity SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id (CONF:5443)
This assignedEntity SHALL contain at least one [1..*] telecom with @xsi:type="TEL" (CONF:5466)
This assignedEntity SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] assignedPerson (CONF:5469)
This assignedPerson SHALL contain at least one [1..*] name
This assignedEntity id SHOULD include zero or one [0..1] @root ="2.16.840.1.113883.4.6" National Provider Identifier (CONF:16821)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] custodian (iv., CONF:5519)
This custodian SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] assignedCustodian (CONF:5520)
This assignedCustodian SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] representedCustodianOrganization (CONF:5521)
This representedCustodianOrganization SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] addr with @xsi:type="US Realm Address" (CONF:5559)
This representedCustodianOrganization SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id (CONF:5522)
This representedCustodianOrganization SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] name (CONF:5524)
This representedCustodianOrganization SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] telecom with @xsi:type="TEL" (CONF:5525)
This representedCustodianOrganization The id SHOULD include zero or one [0..1] @root ="2.16.840.1.113883.4.6" National Provider Identifier (CONF:9996)

MAY contain zero or more [0..*] informationRecipient (CONF:5565)
Such informationRecipients SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] intendedRecipient (CONF:5566)
This intendedRecipient MAY contain zero or one [0..1] informationRecipient (CONF:5568)
This informationRecipient SHALL contain at least one [1..*] name (CONF:5470)
This intendedRecipient MAY contain zero or one [0..1] receivedOrganization (CONF:5577)
This receivedOrganization SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] name (CONF:5578)

SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] legalAuthenticator (CONF:5579)
This legalAuthenticator SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] signatureCode/@code="S" (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.89 Participationsignature) (CONF:5583, CONF:5584)
This legalAuthenticator SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] time (CONF:5580)
This legalAuthenticator Contains zero or one [0..1] assignedEntity
This assignedEntity SHALL contain at least one [1..*] addr with @xsi:type="US Realm Address" (CONF:5589)
This assignedEntity MAY contain zero or one [0..1] code (CONF:17000), which SHOULD be selected from ValueSet Healthcare Provider Taxonomy (NUCC - HIPAA) 2.16.840.1.114222.4.11.1066 DYNAMIC
This assignedEntity SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id (CONF:5586)
This assignedEntity SHALL contain at least one [1..*] telecom with @xsi:type="TEL" (CONF:5595)
This assignedEntity SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] assignedPerson (CONF:5597)
This assignedPerson SHALL contain at least one [1..*] name (CONF:5598)
This assignedEntity The id MAY include zero or one [0..1] root ="2.16.840.1.113883.4.6" National Provider Identifier (CONF:9996) (CONF:16823)

MAY contain zero or more [0..*] authenticator (CONF:5607)
Such authenticators SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] signatureCode/@code="S" (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.89 Participationsignature) (CONF:5610)
Such authenticators SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] time (CONF:5608)
Such authenticators SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] assignedEntity (CONF:5612)
This assignedEntity SHALL contain at least one [1..*] addr with @xsi:type="US Realm Address" (CONF:5616)
This assignedEntity MAY contain zero or one [0..1] code (CONF:16825), which SHOULD be selected from ValueSet Healthcare Provider Taxonomy (NUCC - HIPAA) 2.16.840.1.114222.4.11.1066 DYNAMIC (CONF:16826)
This assignedEntity SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id (CONF:5613)
This assignedEntity SHALL contain at least one [1..*] telecom with @xsi:type="TEL" (CONF:5622)
This assignedEntity SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] assignedPerson (CONF:5624)
This assignedPerson SHALL contain at least one [1..*] name (CONF:5625)
This assignedEntity The id SHOULD include zero or one [0..1] root ="2.16.840.1.113883.4.6" National Provider Identifier (CONF:9996)

MAY contain zero or more [0..*] informant (CONF:8001)
Such informants MAY contain zero or one [0..1] assignedEntity
This assignedEntity SHOULD contain zero or more [0..*] addr with @xsi:type="US Realm Address" (CONF:8220)
This assignedEntity MAY contain zero or one [0..1] code, which SHOULD be selected from (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.101 NUCC Health Care Provider Taxonomy) (CONF:9947)
This assignedEntity SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id (CONF:9945)
This assignedEntity SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] assignedPerson (CONF:8221)
This assignedPerson SHALL contain at least one [1..*] name
This assignedEntity The id SHOULD include zero or one [0..1] id where id/@root ="2.16.840.1.113883.4.6" National Provider Identifier
Such informants MAY contain zero or one [0..1] relatedEntity
This relatedEntity SHOULD contain zero or more [0..*] addr with @xsi:type="US Realm Address" (CONF:8220)
This relatedEntity SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] relatedPerson (CONF:8221)
This relatedPerson SHALL contain at least one [1..*] name
Such informants SHALL satisfy: contain exactly one [1..1] assignedEntity OR exactly one [1..1] relatedEntity (CONF:8002)

MAY contain zero or more [0..*] participant (CONF:10003)
Such participants MAY contain zero or one [0..1] time (CONF:10004)
Such participants Such participants, if present, SHALL have an associatedPerson or scopingOrganization element under participant/associatedEntity. (CONF:10006)
Such participants Unless otherwise specified by the document specific header constraints, when participant/@typeCode is IND, associatedEntity/@classCode SHALL be selected from ValueSet INDRoleclassCodes 2.16.840.1.113883.11.20.9.33 STATIC 2011-09-30.

MAY contain zero or more [0..*] inFulfillmentOf (CONF:9952)
Such inFulfillmentOfs SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] order (CONF:9953)
This order SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id (CONF:9954)

MAY contain zero or more [0..*] documentationOf (CONF:14835)
Such documentationOfs SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] serviceEvent (CONF:14836)
This serviceEvent SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] effectiveTime (CONF:14837)
This serviceEvent SHOULD contain zero or more [0..*] performer (CONF:14839)
Such performers MAY contain zero or one [0..1] functionCode (CONF:16818), which SHOULD be selected from (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.88 ParticipationFunction) (CONF:16819)
Such performers SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode (CONF:14840)
Such performers SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] assignedEntity (CONF:14841)
This assignedEntity SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] code (CONF:14842), which SHOULD be selected from (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.101 NUCC Health Care Provider Taxonomy) (CONF:14843)
This assignedEntity SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id (CONF:14846)
This assignedEntity The id SHOULD include zero or one [0..1]root ="2.16.840.1.113883.4.6" National Provider Identifier (CONF:9996) (CONF:14847)
This serviceEvent effectiveTime SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] low (CONF:14838)

MAY contain zero or more [0..*] authorization (CONF:16792)
Such authorizations SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] consent (CONF:16793)
This consent MAY contain zero or one [0..1] code (CONF:16795)
The type of consent (e.g., a consent to perform the related serviceEvent) is conveyed in consent/code (CONF:16796).
This consent MAY contain zero or more [0..*] id (CONF:16794)
This consent SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] statusCode (CONF:16797)/@code="completed" Completed (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:16798)

SHALL contain at least one [1..*] recordTarget
Such recordTargets SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] patientRole
This patientRole SHALL contain at least one [1..*] addr with @xsi:type="US Realm Address" (CONF:5271)
This patientRole SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id (CONF:5268)
This patientRole SHALL contain at least one [1..*] telecom with @xsi:type="TEL" (CONF:5280)
This patientRole SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] patient
This patient SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] administrativeGenderCode, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet Administrative Gender (HL7 V3) 2.16.840.1.113883.1.11.1 DYNAMIC (CONF:6394)
This patient SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] birthTime with @xsi:type="TS" (CONF:5298)
This patient SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] ethnicGroupCode, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet Ethnicity Category ValueSet STATIC
This patient SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] maritalStatusCode (CONF:5303), which SHALL be selected from ValueSet HL7 Marital Status 2.16.840.1.113883.1.11.12212 STATIC 1
This patient SHALL contain at least one [1..*] name with @xsi:type="US Realm Patient Name" (CONF:5284, CONF:10411)
This patient SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] raceCode, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet Race Category ValueSet STATIC
This patient MAY contain zero or one [0..1] religiousAffiliationCode (CONF:5317), which SHALL be selected from ValueSet HL7 Religious Affiliation 2.16.840.1.113883.1.11.19185 STATIC 1
This patient MAY contain zero or more [0..*] sDTCRaceCode, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet Race Value Set 2.16.840.1.113883.1.11.14914 DYNAMIC (CONF:7263)
Note: The sdtc:raceCode is only used to record additional values when the patient has indicated multiple races or additional race detail beyond the five categories required for Meaningful Use Stage 2. The prefix sdtc: SHALL be bound to the namespace "urn:hl7-org:sdtc". The use of the namespace provides a necessary extension to CDA R2 for the use of the additional raceCode elements.
This patient MAY contain zero or one [0..1] birthplace (CONF:5395)
This birthplace SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] place (CONF:5396)
This place SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] addr (CONF:5397)
This place If country is US, this addr SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] state, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet StateValueSet 2.16.840.1.113883.3.88.12.80.1 DYNAMIC
This place This addr MAY contain zero or one [0..1] postalCode, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet PostalCodeValueSet 2.16.840.1.113883.3.88.12.80.2 DYNAMIC
This place This addr SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] country, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet CountryValueSet 2.16.840.1.113883.3.88.12.80.63 DYNAMIC
This patient MAY contain zero or more [0..*] guardian (CONF:5325)
Such guardians SHOULD contain zero or more [0..*] addr with @xsi:type="US Realm Address"
Such guardians SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] code (CONF:5326)
Such guardians MAY contain zero or more [0..*] telecom with @xsi:type="TEL"
Such guardians SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] guardianPerson
This guardianPerson SHALL contain at least one [1..*] name
This guardianPerson The content of name SHALL be a conformant US Realm Person Name (PTN.US.FIELDED) (2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.5.1.1) (CONF:10414)
Such guardians The guardian code, if present, SHALL be selected from ValueSet PersonalRelationshipRoleType 2.16.840.1.113883.1.11.19563 DYNAMIC or ValueSet Responsible Party 2.16.840.1.113883.1.11.19830 DYNAMIC (CONF:5326)
This patient SHOULD contain zero or more [0..*] languageCommunication
Such languageCommunications SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] languageCode
Such languageCommunications MAY contain zero or one [0..1] modeCode, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet HL7 LanguageAbilityMode 2.16.840.1.113883.1.11.12249 STATIC 1 (CONF:5409)
Such languageCommunications MAY contain zero or one [0..1] preferenceInd (CONF:5414)
Such languageCommunications SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] proficiencyLevelCode, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet LanguageAbilityProficiency 2.16.840.1.113883.1.11.12199 STATIC (CONF:9965)
Such languageCommunications languageCode SHALL be selected from ValueSet LanguageCode STATIC where the @code SHALL be selected from the set of alpha-3 codes of ISO 639-2 that are in ISO 639-1
This patientRole MAY contain zero or one [0..1] providerOrganization (CONF:5416)
This providerOrganization SHALL contain at least one [1..*] addr with @xsi:type="US Realm Address" (CONF:5422)
This providerOrganization SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id (CONF:5417)
This providerOrganization SHALL contain at least one [1..*] name (CONF:5419)
This providerOrganization SHALL contain at least one [1..*] telecom with @xsi:type="TEL" (CONF:5420)
This providerOrganization The id SHOULD include zero or one [0..1] id where id/@root ="2.16.840.1.113883.4.6" National Provider Identifier (CONF:9996) (CONF:9996)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] component
Contains exactly one [1..1] Consol Problem Section (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.5.1)

Contains exactly one [1..1] component
Contains exactly one [1..1] Consol Medications Section (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.1.1)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] component
Contains exactly one [1..1] Consol Allergies Section (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.6.1)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] component
Contains exactly one [1..1] Results Section (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.3.1)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] component
Contains exactly one [1..1] Procedures Section (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.7.1)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] component
Contains exactly one [1..1] Consol Immunizations Section (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.2.1)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] component
Contains exactly one [1..1] Consol Instructions Section (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.45)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] component
Contains exactly one [1..1] Social History Section (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.17)

Contains exactly one [1..1] component
Contains exactly one [1..1] Medications Administered Section (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.38)

SHALL satisfy: [DEPRECATED] The US Realm Clinical Document Date and Time datatype flavor records date and time information. If no time zone offset is provided, you can make no assumption about time, unless you have made a local exchange agreement. This data type uses the same rules as US Realm Date and Time (DTM.US.FIELDED), but is used with the effectiveTime element.

SHALL satisfy: The US Realm Clinical Document Date and Time datatype flavor records date and time information. If no time zone offset is provided, you can make no assumption about time, unless you have made a local exchange agreement.
typeId SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.1.3" (CONF:5250)
typeId SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @extension="POCD_HD000040" (CONF:5251)
id SHALL be a globally unique identifier for the document (CONF:9991)
code SHALL specify the particular kind of document (e.g. History and Physical, Discharge Summary, Progress Note). (CONF:9992)
If setId is present versionNumber SHALL be present (CONF:6380)
If versionNumber is present setId SHALL be present (CONF:6387)

SHALL have at least one documentationOf/serviceEvent/performer OR have at least one componentOf/encompassingEncounter/responsibleParty OR have at least one componentOf/encompassingEncounter/encounterParticipant

SHALL have one Reason for Visit Section (TemplateID = 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.12) or Chief Complaint Section (TemplateID = 1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.1.13.2.1) or Chief Complaint and Reason for Visit Section (2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.13) or Encounters section entries optional (TemplateID: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.22) or Encounters section entries required (TemplateID: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.22.1)

SHALL satisfy: Shall have one documentationOf/serviceEvent/effectiveTime or componentOf/encompassingEncounter/effectiveTime or Encounters section entries optional (TemplateID: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.22) or Encounters section entries required (TemplateID: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.22.1)

SHALL satisfy: Shall have componentOf/encompassingEncounter/location or Encounters section entries optional (TemplateID: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.22) or Encounters section entries required (TemplateID: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.22.1)

SHALL have at least one documentationOf/serviceEvent/performer/assignedEntity including a documentationOf/serviceEvent/performer/assignedEntity/assignedPerson/name and documentationOf/serviceEvent/performer/assignedEntity/telecom and documentationOf/serviceEvent/performer/assignedEntity/addr
OR at least one componentOf/encompassingEncounter/responsibleParty including a componentOf/encompassingEncounter/responsibleParty/assignedEntity/assignedPerson/name and componentOf/encompassingEncounter/responsibleParty/assignedEntity/telecom and componentOf/encompassingEncounter/responsibleParty/assignedEntity/addr
OR at least one componentOf/encompassingEncounter/encounterParticipant including a componentOf/encompassingEncounter/encounterParticipant/assignedEntity/assignedPerson/name and componentOf/encompassingEncounter/encounterParticipant/assignedEntity/telecom and componentOf/encompassingEncounter/encounterParticipant/assignedEntity/addr
SHALL have one Vital Signs Section with entries optional (TemplateID = 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.4) or one Vital Signs Section with entries required (TemplateID = 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.4.1)
SHALL contain one Medications Administered Section (Template ID = 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.38) or Medications Section with entries required (Template ID = 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.1.1)

body.codeblock: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <ClinicalDocument xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns="urn:hl7-org:v3" xsi:schemaLocation="urn:hl7-org:v3 CDA.xsd">
